reviewtext: Three problems.1. Focus mechanism to flimsy bends when you put binoculars to your head.2. The adjustable eyepiece ran out of adjustment for my eyes.3. The interpupillary adjustment did not open enough for my eyes to get a single circleI have a pair of Bushnell 10 x 50 binoculars and they're great but this item is a dud returned for credit. Disappointed in Bushnell with these.
